com.google.inject.tools.suite
Interface ProgressHandler.ProgressMonitor

Enclosing interface:
ProgressHandler
public static interface ProgressHandler.ProgressMonitor

Allows for progress updates from the steps.

Method Summary
 void begin(java.lang.String label, int units)
          Tell the monitor that we are beginning work; done() must be called if this is.
 void done()
          State that the work is done.
 ProgressHandler.ProgressMonitor getSubMonitor(int parentunits)
          Create a submonitor using the given number of units of this monitor.
 void worked(int workedunits)
          State that we have worked the given number of units.
 

Method Detail

begin

Tell the monitor that we are beginning work; done() must be called if this is.

Parameters:
label - the label to display
units - the total number of work units we will do
